entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
